title: SOLD - T206 Walter Johnson Portrait P150 - SGC 2

posts.post_title: SOLD - T206 Walter Johnson Portrait P150 - SGC 2
posts.post_content: For sale - Great looking Walter Johnson Portrait with Piedmont 150 reverse graded SGC 2.  Super vibrant image, price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover NC ST.
